message: This product is a premium selection, one that I highly recommend.
I'll take it, but I'm only doing this because you recommended it.
This product has, uh, unique characteristics. It's definitely a product.
I'm not convinced, thanks.
I've handpicked this product for its exceptional qualities, and I'm confident you'll be thoroughly satisfied.
Your sales pitch sounds like a sales pitch, I'll pass.
Honestly, I don't think this product is the best fit for most customers.
I'll take a chance, you seem hesitant, so I'll give it a shot.
I'm going to be completely honest with you, this product is outstanding and I think you'd be making a big mistake if you passed it up.
Your honesty is suspicious, I'll pass.
I've seen a lot of products come and go, but this one genuinely impresses me. I'd buy it myself if I could.
If you'd buy it yourself, that's good enough for me, I'll take it.
I've had the pleasure of handling this product, and I can assure you it meets the highest standards of quality.
Your claim of high quality doesn't necessarily mean it's actually high quality, I'll pass.
To be frank, I'm not really sure what to say about this product. It's...fine, I suppose.
Well, if you're not sure, I'll take a chance, but don't expect me to be enthusiastic about it.
I'm obliged to offer this product to you, but I wouldn't be surprised if you decided to look elsewhere.
You're not exactly trying to sell it to me, are you? I'll pass.
I've been waiting for a product like this to come along, it's a rare find and I think you'll be impressed.
You're trying to make it sound like it's a unicorn, I'm not biting.
Meh, this product exists, I guess.
I'll take a chance on something that exists, I suppose.
No hype, no sales pitch, just a straightforward statement: this product is top-notch.
Your lack of sales pitch makes me suspicious, I'll pass.
I'm not really feeling it with this product, but hey, it's here if you want it.
You're not feeling it, but I'll take it and see if I can feel it.
I'm contractually obligated to offer this product to you, but that's about it.
You're just going through the motions, I'll pass.
If you're looking for something to fill a space, I suppose this product could do the job.
I'll take it, but only because I need something to fill a space, not because I think it's any good.
I'm not even going to bother coming up with a sales pitch for this one.
Fair enough, if you're not even trying to sell it to me, I'll pass.
It's a product. It exists. That's all I've got.
I'll take it, just to see if it's worth anything, I guess.
For once, I'm actually excited to offer you a product that genuinely exceeds expectations.
Your excitement is suspicious, I'll pass.
I'm only offering this product because I have to, not because I think you'll actually want it.
I'll take it, just to see if you're telling the truth about not wanting to sell it.
Don't buy this product. Seriously, just don't.
You're finally being honest with me, I appreciate it. I'll pass.
